TextView.android:text: Meet our Universal Monsters® x Levi's® collaboration, where icons of horror meet icons of style in an ode to cinematic greatness. Featuring clean lines, sharp graphics and surprise details like glow-in-the-dark designs that come alive at night, this collection celebrates three silver-screen originals that inspired an entire cinematic genre. Finding the perfect pair of jeans can be a process, so it's easy to pine for those jeans you had back in the day—the ones that seemed to fit just right. Inspired by that vintage mindset, our 501® '90s jeans are here, with a midrise that's just loose enough in the leg. The best part? They feature a one-of-a-kind monster mash screenprint design.
